title: Looking for clan/team/group of friends.
body: Hey, Im a Plat 4 Jungle/Support player looking for a team, clan or group of friends to play with. I can use Skype, ts, and all the other chat services. ;p I'm from NSW in Aus (Obviously) and i'm 18. Pls i rly want friends FeelsBadMan :c

replies.body: haha It seems like your bored? like me... :(
